features: COMMERCIAL USE - Tailored for seamless use in commercial and home settings.
LONG LASTING - With a detachable 3-liter water reservoir, it delivers more than 90 minutes of uninterrupted steam.
EASE - Effortlessly achieve wrinkle-free clothes, drapes, and upholstery while conveniently hanging any garment with the versatile multifunctional hanger for safety.
DESIGN - Featuring a broad support frame, a control system operated by a power pedal, and a transparent 3-liter tank that can be easily removed.
STORAGE - Equipped with rolling wheels for effortless mobility, the telescopic aluminum support bar conveniently stores away.
POWERFUL - Generating a powerful 1800 watts of steam, it's your go-to for smoothing out wrinkles on any fabric!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SALAV X3A Commercial Full Size Garment Steamer The SALAV X3A Commercial Full-Sized Garment Steamer has a powerful 1800 watts of steam that is great for both residential and commercial use. The extra large 3L water tank allows 90 min. worth of steam time, and the foot pedal power control is a very convenient way in turning the unit on.

What type of water should I use on my steamer? We highly recommend using distilled water to prolong the life of your steamer and to prevent mineral build-up caused by hard water (tap water). Is it necessary to drain the water and reservoir after each use? It's best practice to drain the excess water from the tank and reservoir to prolong the life of your steamer and to prevent mineral build-up. It also prevents water from spilling while in storage. I just got my steamer and the steam hose is really stiff. The hose is made with dual-insulated material to regulate temperature and once you start using your steamer, the hose will become softer. Does it have auto shut-off? It has an auto temperature regulation where it will stop producing more heat once the water runs out, but it will not turn off by itself. How do I attach the steam hose to the steamer? The hose has a double-lock system. First, insert the hose to the unit. Hold the hose from the base and twist it clockwise in 2 full cycles. Once the hose is locked in place, pull the hose up to make sure it's tightly secured before using the steamer.

Previous page Powerful 1800 watts of steam that is great for both residential and commercial use. The 360 swivel hanger with hanger clips is designed so it can hang several clothes at the same time. The Foot Pedal Power Control is conveniently and ergonomically located for easy access. The extra large 3 liter capacity water tank allows continuous steaming of up to 90 minutes. The included attachment is both a fabric brush and pants press. Next page 1 1800 watts of steam 2 360 degrees Swivel Hanger 3 Foot Pedal Power Control 4 Extra Large 3L Water Tank 5 2-in-1 Attachment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I own a very large bridal and prom store and this is perfect for quick jobs because it is big enough to steam for a couple hours yet small enough to easily store hidden in a nearby closet close by for quick access. Gets the dresses steamed out quickly and wrinkle free. Does not drip on hand while using. Heats up very fast. Wish it had a longer hose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy with my X3 Commercial Full-Size Garment Steamer purchase. I only wish I had gotten it sooner! The thoughtful design of this steamer is impressive, with every feature carefully considered for ease of use.The hanger holder is a game-changer. It tightens to keep clothes in place, making it easy to steam every inch of the garment without a struggle. The extra-long hose is insulated and reinforced, so you won't burn yourself on it, and the garment rack/steamer holder is adjustable for easy storage. The steamer is on two wheels, making it sturdy yet easy to move around.Using this steamer is a breeze. Just fill the water tank, plug it in, and turn it on. Steam starts flowing in less than a minute, and there's enough steam to remove wrinkles without leaving clothes damp. The steam production is steady, so there's no need to keep stopping or going back over areas.My only complaint is with the instructions. They could have been more detailed, especially when using the steamer and the fabric attachment that goes on the steamer head.Overall, I highly recommend the X3 Commercial Full-Size Garment Steamer. It's a well-designed, easy-to-use steamer that gets the job done without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and powerful steamer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my business and have been very happy with the performance of this steamer. It's quick to get up to temperature, and the steam flow is very smooth, with very little dripping if you hold the dispenser upright. Assembly was also very easy. Make sure you use distilled water for this machine, which is not always easy to find but Whole Foods tends to have it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as good as rowenta
reviews.reviewText: I liked the fact that it had more powerful steam, but it’s a little cheaply made compared to the Rowena I was replacing. It works fine for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Steamer I Have Ever Owned
reviews.reviewText: Incredible steamer! It’s very strong and works better than any other steamer I’ve ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Far So Good
reviews.reviewText: Just started using this today. But so far it has been great. Steamed several children's outfits, one after the other. Did have to give it a break for a few minutes. But otherwise great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bye bye iron
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite thing to use it's easy and fast. Will knock out any wrinkle moving easy to assemble and very easy to use no more bending over to press your colthes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I think I love it
reviews.reviewText: I mean I’ve only used it on one top, to make sure it worked. It did a great job, so that’s cool. Was very simple to setup and easy to use… yes there’s a but. I have owned some of the best irons and steamers over the years. (Sadly even with the best care, they don’t last forever.) Having to wear a pressed uniform to work for 3 decades. So was surprised the water tank doesn’t click or lock in place. Just sits there, easily knocked off. And only one level of steam, no button or lever for more or less power. Still for my needs now I’m thinking it will work just fine. If I have something that needs serious attention I’ll pull out my Rowenta. But this unit can stay in my dressing area without being in the way..
J’ai un centre de couture en réparation de vêtements le défroisseur est super pratique et surtout la force de vapeur j’adore
